style.label: function(f) { var name = f.get('Name'); var clean = name.replace(/.*redundant_exons./, ''); var cleaner = clean.replace(/_[+-].*/,''); return cleaner;  }

metadata.shortInfo: Non-redundant exon creation from 14 stages. We aggregated gene models generated from RNA-seq, RTPCR, mass-spec, and confirmed polyA/SL sites from 14 different stages and/or strains to identify the minimum set of non-redundant exons for C. elegans. These were mapped to WS190.
